name: Minimalist Pong
description: Ahh, the integral pong. Its kinda lame and boring, but as a first game it is always a good start. So for week 1 I have made the famous pong. So for this I learned about drawing rectangles, some collision detection and user input. Enjoy. The full source code is available, if you scroll down.In fact I made this game in about 3 hours, but then again. I don't want overwork myself now do I.
